com.squareup.android
Class LineItem.Builder

java.lang.Object
  com.squareup.android.LineItem.Builder
Enclosing class:
LineItem
public static final class LineItem.Builder
extends java.lang.Object

Builds a line item. A price is required. Other attributes are optional.

Method Detail

description

public LineItem.Builder description(java.lang.String description)
Describes the item in 140 characters or less. Optional.

Parameters:
description - of the item, 140 characters max
Returns:
this builder
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the description is already set
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if description is greater than 140 characters
java.lang.NullPointerException - if description is null

price

public LineItem.Builder price(int amount,
                              Currency currency)
Convenience method, equivalent to price(new Price(amount, currency)).

Parameters:
amount - atomic units of the specified currency, >= 0 && <= 999,999,999
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if amount > 999,999,999
See Also:
Money.Money(long, com.squareup.android.Currency)

price

public LineItem.Builder price(Money price)
Specifies the price of the line item. Required.

Parameters:
price - of the line item, price.amount() <= Integer.MAX_VALUE
Returns:
this builder
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the price is already set
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if price.amount() > Integer.MAX_VALUE

image

public LineItem.Builder image(android.net.Uri url,
                              Image.Type imageType)
Convenience method, equivalent to image(new Image(url, imageType)).

See Also:
Image.Image(android.net.Uri, com.squareup.android.Image.Type)

image

public LineItem.Builder image(Image image)
Associates an image with the item. Optional. Supports the following URL schemes:
  1. content:// - Retrieves the image from a content provider using ContentResolver.
  2. file:// - Reads the file from the file system. The file can be on the SD card or in the application's private data directory.
  3. android.resource:// - Reads the image from a resource in the APK. See ContentResolver.openAssetFileDescriptor(android.net.Uri, java.lang.String) for a definition of the URI scheme.

Returns:
this builder
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the image is already set
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the URL uses an unsupported scheme or is otherwise malformed
java.lang.NullPointerException - if image is null

build

public LineItem build()
Builds an item.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the price wasn't set
